properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 6:01AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Towaliga River near Juliette.
* From this morning until further notice.
* At 445 AM Friday the stage was 16.2 feet...and rising.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* At 16.0 feet...Minor flooding of woodlands in the natural flood
plain begins along the river.  Low lying areas of Byars Road...
downstream and right bank from the gage on Monticello Highway or
Georgia Highway 83 will begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
